title: Taming molecular beams
title_cn: 驯服分子束
abstract: The motion of neutral molecules in a beam can be manipulated with inhomogeneous electric and magnetic fields. Static fields can be used to deflect or focus molecules, whereas time-varying fields can be used to decelerate or accelerate beams of molecules to any desired velocity. We review the possibilities that this molecular-beam technology offers, ranging from ultrahigh-resolution spectroscopy using molecular fountains to novel crossed-beam scattering experiments.
abstract_cn: 光束中的中性分子的运动可以通过不均匀的电场和磁场来控制。 静态场可用于偏转或聚焦分子，而时变场可用于将分子束减速或加速到任何所需的速度。 我们回顾了这种分子束技术提供的可能性，从使用分子喷泉的超高分辨率光谱学到新颖的交叉束散射实验。

title: Dislocations and vortices in pair-density-wave superconductors
title_cn: 对密度波超导体中的位错和涡旋
abstract: With the groundbreaking work of Fulde, Ferrell, Larkin and Ovchinnikov, it was realized that superconducting order can also break translational invariance, leading to a phase in which the Cooper pairs develop a coherent periodic spatially oscillating structure. Such pair-density-wave (PDW) superconductivity has become relevant in a diverse range of systems, including cuprates, organic superconductors, heavy-fermion superconductors, cold atoms and high-density quark matter. Here we show that, in addition to charge-density-wave (CDW) order, there are PDW ground states that induce spin-density-wave (SDW) order when there is no applied magnetic field. Furthermore, we show that PDW phases support topological defects that combine dislocations in the induced CDW/SDW order with a fractional vortex in the usual superconducting order. These defects provide a mechanism for fluctuation-driven non-superconducting CDW/SDW phases and conventional vortices with CDW/SDW order in the core.
abstract_cn: 通过Fulde，Ferrell，Larkin和Ovchinnikov的开创性工作，人们认识到超导顺序也可以打破平移不变性，从而导致库珀对发展出一个连贯的周期性空间振荡结构的阶段。 这种对密度波（PDW）超导性已在包括铜酸盐，有机超导体，重费米子超导体，冷原子和高密度夸克物质在内的各种系统中变得相关。 在这里，我们表明，除了电荷密度波（CDW）阶外，当没有施加磁场时，还有PDW基态会诱发自旋密度波（SDW）阶。 此外，我们表明PDW相支持拓扑缺陷，该缺陷结合了诱导的CDW / SDW顺序中的位错和通常超导顺序中的分数涡。 这些缺陷为波动驱动的非超导CDW / SDW相和以CDW / SDW顺序为核心的常规涡旋提供了一种机制。

title: Heavy electrons and the symplectic symmetry of spin
title_cn: 重电子与自旋的辛对称性
abstract: The recent discovery of two heavy-fermion materials PuCoGa5 and NpPd5Al2, which transform directly from Curie paramagnets into superconductors, reveals a new class of superconductors where local moments quench directly into the superconducting condensate. Unlike other heavy-electron superconductors, where Cooper pairing is thought to be driven by spin fluctuations, these higher-transition-temperature materials do not seem to be close to a magnetic instability. Large-N expansions have been invaluable in describing heavy-fermion metals, but so far cannot treat superconductivity. Here, we introduce a new class of large-N expansion that uses symplectic symmetry to protect the odd time-reversal parity of spin and sustain Cooper pairs as well-defined singlets. We show that when a lattice of magnetic ions exchange spin with their metallic environment in two distinct symmetry channels, they can simultaneously satisfy both channels by forming a condensate of composite pairs between local moments and electrons. In the tetragonal crystalline environment relevant to PuCoGa5 and NpPd5Al2, the lattice structure selects a natural pair of spin exchange channels, predicting a unique anisotropic paired state with either d- or g-wave symmetry. This pairing mechanism also predicts a large upturn in the NMR relaxation rate above Tc and strong enhancement of Andreev reflection in tunnelling measurements.
abstract_cn: 最近发现了两种重铁物质PuCoGa 5 和NpPd 5 Al 2 ，它们直接从居里顺磁体转变为超导体，揭示了一种新型的超导体，其中局部矩直接淬灭到超导冷凝物中。与其他重电子超导体不同（库珀配对被认为是由自旋涨落驱动），这些更高转变温度的材料似乎与磁性不稳定性接近。大N膨胀在描述重金属时是无价的，但到目前为止还不能处理超导电性。在这里，我们介绍一类新的大N展开式，它使用辛对称性来保护自旋和维持Cooper对以及定义明确的单线态的奇数时间反转奇偶性。我们表明，当磁性离子的晶格交换在两个不同的对称通道中与其金属环境自旋时，它们可以通过在局部力矩和电子之间形成复合对的凝聚而同时满足两个通道。在与PuCoGa 5 和NpPd 5 Al 2 相关的四方晶体环境中，晶格结构选择了一对自然的自旋交换通道，从而预测了具有d波或g波对称性的唯一各向异性配对状态。这种配对机制还预测了在T c 以上的NMR弛豫速率将有较大的回升，并在隧道测量中强烈增强Andreev反射。

title: Localization and loss of coherence in molecular double-slit experiments
title_cn: 分子双缝实验中的定位和相干损失
abstract: In molecular double-slit experiments, the interference between emitted core electrons of diatomic molecules gives rise to oscillations in the observed electron intensity. Here, we explore this behaviour for photoelectrons emitted from CO and N2 by soft X-ray ionization in the molecular frame, and we argue that in addition to the undisturbed emission process, intramolecular scattering can lead to electron interference between the scattered and unscattered wave in two ways: two-centre interference between two spatially coherent emitters and one-centre self-interference. The latter is the signature of a loss of spatial coherence. The spatial scale over which the transition from two-centre to one-centre coherence occurs is the de Broglie wavelength of the scattered photoelectron in units of the bond length. These results highlight the fact that the molecular double slit is based on two independent uncertainty principles, ΔpxΔx and ΔEΔt, the second of which causes ongoing tunnelling between the two centres, even after the collapse of the electron wavefunction in real space.
abstract_cn: 在分子双缝实验中，双原子分子的发射核电子之间的干扰导致观察到的电子强度发生振荡。在这里，我们探讨了分子框架中通过软X射线电离从CO和N 2 发射的光电子的这种行为，并且我们认为除了分子的散射过程不受干扰外，还可以导致电子散射波和非散射波之间的干扰有两种方式：两个空间相干的发射器之间的二中心干扰和一中心的自干扰。后者是空间连贯性丧失的标志。从2中心相干到1中心相干过渡发生的空间尺度是以键长为单位的散射光电子的de Broglie波长。这些结果凸显了这样一个事实，分子双缝基于两个独立的不确定性原理，即＆p916; p x ＆＃916; x和＆＃916; E＆＃916; t即使在真实空间中电子波函数崩溃之后，这仍会导致两个中心之间持续的隧穿。

title: Gate-induced quantum-confinement transition of a single dopant atom in a silicon FinFET
title_cn: 硅FinFET中单个掺杂原子的栅极诱导量子约束跃迁
abstract: The ability to build structures with atomic precision is one of the defining features of nanotechnology. Achieving true atomic-level functionality, however, requires the ability to control the wavefunctions of individual atoms. Here, we investigate an approach that could enable just that. By collecting and analysing transport spectra of a single donor atom in the channel of a silicon FinFET, we present experimental evidence for the emergence of a new type of hybrid molecule system. Our experiments and simulations suggest that the transistor’s gate potential can be used to control the degree of hybridization of a single electron donor state between the nuclear potential of its donor atom and a nearby quantum well. Moreover, our theoretical analysis enables us to determine the species of donor (arsenic) implanted into each device as well as the degree of confinement imposed by the gate.
abstract_cn: 以原子精度构建结构的能力是纳米技术的主要特征之一。 但是，要实现真正的原子级功能，就需要能够控制单个原子的波函数。 在这里，我们研究一种可以实现这一目标的方法。 通过收集和分析硅FinFET通道中单个供体原子的传输光谱，我们为新型混合分子系统的出现提供了实验证据。 我们的实验和模拟表明，晶体管的栅极电势可用于控制单个电子给体状态在其施主原子的核电势与附近的量子阱之间的杂交程度。 此外，我们的理论分析使我们能够确定植入每个设备的施主（砷）的种类以及门所施加的限制程度。

title: Erratum: Beating the channel capacity limit for linear photonic superdense coding
title_cn: 勘误：突破了线性光子超密集编码的信道容量限制

title: Message found in a gravity wave
title_cn: 在重力波中找到消息
